title: School Records
copy: Please note that the Institutional Archives are not the repository for student records. All inquiries regarding confirmation of enrollment, courses taken, and credits received, as well as requests for transcripts, must be directed to the School of the Art Institute’s Office of Registration and Records (see below for contact information). Series Alumni Associations Circular of Instruction, 1879– Dean’s Office Former faculty files, 1880–1987 Ox-Bow Summer School SAIC Student Publications For additional information on the history of School of the Art Institute of Chicago, see our Researching Art Institute History research guide (link to Collection>Resources>Research Guides>AIC History) and this online history of the School of the Art Institute of Chicago . The Office of Registration and Records The School of the Art Institute of Chicago 37 South Wabash Avenue, Suite 1450 Chicago, IL 60606-3107 (312) 629-6700 saic.registrar@saic.edu
